test_data_warning: Note, you are using test data, if you want to display the actual information, configure the .env file accordingly.
biggest_challenge: The biggest challenge was creating the design of the site, which you can probably see, and writing tests due to the fact that I had never done it, this was the first time.
the_most_fun: The most fun, of course, was the actual implementation of all the mechanics, the whole project. I probably spent more time on it than I should have, but I love tinkering.
